section.title: ul.lookup
section.para: Lookup one AOR in the usrloc location table

section.title: ul.rm
section.para: Delete a address of record including its contacts

section.title: ul.rm_contact
section.para: Delete a contact from an AOR record

section.title: ul.flush
section.para: Flush the usrloc memory cache to DB

section.title: ul.add
section.para: Add a new contact for an address of record

section.title: ul.db_users
section.para: Tell number of different unexpired users (AoRs) in database table (db_mode!=0 only)

section.title: ul.db_contacts
section.para: Tell number of unexpired contacts in database table (db_mode=3 only)

section.title: ul.db_expired_contacts
section.para: Tell number of expired contacts in database table (db_mode=3 only)
